title: Take 50% off any Casely iPhone case in this crazy site-wide blowout sale
description: Macworld Searching for an iPhone case can be a difficult task with so many options at such a wide array of prices. But this sale makes it easy: Casely is slashing 50 percent off its entire lineup of iPhone cases in a massive sale that ends Friday. In our roundup of the best iPhone cases, we named Casely as our favorite case for colorful protection due to its incredible library of designs. The are hundreds of options, from graphic illustrations to solid colors, patterns, logos, and artist collaborations. We can’t begin to list all the models available, but many are available for less than $10, dropping prices below even the 50 percent off sale. This sale is scheduled to end at midnight on Saturday, so act fast if you want to save big on a new iPhone case. The sale also includes AirPods cases, bags, cables, and screen protectors, so even if you’re happy with your current iPhone case, head over to take advantage of some huge savings. Browse Casely's massive 50% off sale
byline: Author: Michael Simon, Executive Editor, Macworld
excerpt: The entire site is half off.

Michael Simon has been covering Apple for more than 20 years. He started covering rumors with Spymac when the iPod was the iWalk, and has owned nearly every iPhone Apple has ever made. He lives in Connecticut with his wife, son, and far too many gadgets.
html:
Image: Casely

Searching for an iPhone case can be a difficult task with so many options at such a wide array of prices. But this sale makes it easy: Casely is slashing 50 percent off its entire lineup of iPhone cases in a massive sale that ends Friday.

In our roundup of the best iPhone cases, we named Casely as our favorite case for colorful protection due to its incredible library of designs. The are hundreds of options, from graphic illustrations to solid colors, patterns, logos, and artist collaborations. We can’t begin to list all the models available, but many are available for less than $10, dropping prices below even the 50 percent off sale.

This sale is scheduled to end at midnight on Saturday, so act fast if you want to save big on a new iPhone case. The sale also includes AirPods cases, bags, cables, and screen protectors, so even if you’re happy with your current iPhone case, head over to take advantage of some huge savings.

Michael Simon has been covering Apple for more than 20 years. He started covering rumors with Spymac when the iPod was the iWalk, and has owned nearly every iPhone Apple has ever made. He lives in Connecticut with his wife, son, and far too many gadgets.
